metadata.title: CVE-2016-2414 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Minikin library in Android 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and6.x before 2016-04-01 does not properly consider negative size values infont data, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory corruption and reboot loop) via a crafted font, aka internal bug26413177.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
